basics.name: Levi Kuhaulua

basics.summary: Aloha mai kākou. I am studying for my BA in Computer Science and am passionate about web development.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Responsible for maintaining and troubleshooting all equipment and accounts in eSports arena.

Leading a group of student workers to help manage and operate eSports

work.summary: Assist students with their homework problems and help them with applying to college.
highlights: Answer students' questions regarding the college app process and scholarship app process

work.summary: Serve as the first point of contact for issues submitted by students and faculty of HPU
highlights: Created over 30 pages of documentation for users and other technicians
Boosted teacher and student satisfaction by resolving over 1200 tickets
